Structs/PostVar.html#/s:4page7PostVarV5v.name: value
Structs/PostVar.html#/s:4page7PostVarV5v.abstract: Get and set the value of the post variable as String.

Structs/PostVar.html#/s:4page7PostVarV7i.name: isValid
Structs/PostVar.html#/s:4page7PostVarV7i.abstract: Check if there was an error parsing the get variable.

Structs/GetVar.html#/s:4page6GetVarV5val.name: value
Structs/GetVar.html#/s:4page6GetVarV5val.abstract: Get and set the value of the get variable as String.

Structs/GetVar.html#/s:4page6GetVarV7isV.name: isValid
Structs/GetVar.html#/s:4page6GetVarV7isV.abstract: Check if there was an error parsing the get variable.

Structs/PageFileCache/KeyFlags.html.name: KeyFlags
Structs/PageFileCache/KeyFlags.html.abstract: KeyFlags contains the parts used to generate a unique key for the cache entry.

Structs/PageFileCache.html#/s:4page13Pag.name: getKey(_:_:_:)
Structs/PageFileCache.html#/s:4page13Pag.abstract: Get a unique key for the run that created the PageFileCache.

Structs/CookieVar.html#/s:4page9CookieVa.name: value
Structs/CookieVar.html#/s:4page9CookieVa.abstract: Get the value of the cookie as String.

Structs/CookieVar.html#/s:4page9CookieVa.name: isValid
Structs/CookieVar.html#/s:4page9CookieVa.abstract: Check if there was an error parsing the cookie.

Structs/CookieVar.html.name: CookieVar
Structs/CookieVar.html.abstract: Single cookie values are accessed, updated or removed with a CookieVar.

Structs.html#/s:4page6CookieV.name: Cookie
Structs.html#/s:4page6CookieV.abstract: For each registered cookie there is a property with the cookies name in the Cookie struct.

Structs.html#/s:4page4PostV.name: Post
Structs.html#/s:4page4PostV.abstract: For each registered post variable there is a property with the variables name in the Post struct.

Structs.html#/s:4page3GetV.name: Get
Structs.html#/s:4page3GetV.abstract: For each registered get variable there is a property with the variables name in the Get struct.

Structs.html#/s:4page7SessionV.name: Session
Structs.html#/s:4page7SessionV.abstract: For each registered session variable there is a property with the variables name in the Session struct.

Structs/PageEvent.html.name: PageEvent
Structs/PageEvent.html.abstract: The page run receives PageEvent items on events like uploads or errors.

Structs/PageFileCache.html.name: PageFileCache
Structs/PageFileCache.html.abstract: PageFileCache is used to cache the result of a page run with a file.

Structs.html#/s:4page10SessionVarV.name: SessionVar
Structs.html#/s:4page10SessionVarV.abstract: Session variables are accessed and updated with a SessionVar.

Structs/GetVar.html.name: GetVar
Structs/GetVar.html.abstract: Get variables are accessed and updated with a GetVar.

Structs/PostVar.html.name: PostVar
Structs/PostVar.html.abstract: Post variables are accessed and updated with a PostVar.

Functions.html#/s:4page8printSubyyF.name: printSub()
Functions.html#/s:4page8printSubyyF.abstract: printSub is part of the template engine for pages.

Functions.html#/s:4page7readSubSSSgyF.name: readSub()
Functions.html#/s:4page7readSubSSSgyF.abstract: readSub is part of the template engine for pages.

Extensions/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV.name: mobile
Extensions/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV.abstract: Returns true if the user is connected from a mobile device.

Extensions/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV.name: parse_lang
Extensions/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV.abstract: Returns the preferred languages of a user.

Extensions/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV.name: remoteAddr
Extensions/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV.abstract: Returns the inet address of the connections remote client.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: position
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Return the current output position for the page result data.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: canPush
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Return true if it is possible to push assets to the receiver.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: push(_:_:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Push a file to the receiver.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: resultStatus
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get or set the resulting HTTP status code.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: error
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Force a Page Error result.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: doCache
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: If set to false, onGetCache is not called.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: sameOrigin
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Return true if request origin and current host match.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: skinId
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get or set the current skin id. Pages can have different skins for their templates.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: userData
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get or set user data for the page run.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: pathStrip(sprefix:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Strip a prefix from the path.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: path
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the current path the page was accessed with.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: path_full
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the full current path the page was accessed with.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: entry
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the current entry the page was accessed with.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: origin
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the origin of the page requester.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: referer
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the referer of the page requester.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: has_referer
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get true if the requester has set a referer.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: param
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the param of the page requester.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: host
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get get the current host the page was accessed with.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: domain
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get get or set the current domain the page was accessed with.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: setMime(_:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Set the request result mime type for the Page.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: setMime()
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Try to set the request result mime type for the Page from the request path.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: target
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Returns true if the current view is the target for a get or post request.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: requestMethod
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the current request method.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: requestVersion
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the current request version.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: root
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the root of the page in the run tree. The root can be used to get a menu for that part or the run tree.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: current
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get the current page.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: linkRelative
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Get or set the relative link state.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: setAltHost(_:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Set an alternative host String that is used for e.g. absolute links.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: setIsLinkSSL(_:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Force SSL for e.g. absolute links.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: addResultHeader(_:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Add a custom header to the request result.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: clearResultHeaders()
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Clear all added custom headers.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: headers(_:ordered:trim:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Map header names to their parsed values.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: method(_:ordered:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Map request method names to the current request method.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: rawBody
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Returns the body data as an unlinked file.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: schema
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Returns the current schema used by the remote.

Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: redirect(to:_:)
Extensions/Page.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: Redirect a page to another location.

Extensions/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV.name: toSelf()
Extensions/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV.abstract: Create a Link to the current run as a whole.

Extensions/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV.name: to(viewId:_:)
Extensions/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV.abstract: Create a Link to the current view.

Extensions/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV.name: toHostString(_:)
Extensions/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV.abstract: Returns the link as a String to print.

Enums/PageCacheResult.html#/s:4page15Pag.name: CACHED(_:sizeLimit:offset:memCache:)
Enums/PageCacheResult.html#/s:4page15Pag.abstract: Set the file for reading or writing the cache data. The file must be open.

Enums.html#/s:4page13PageEventTypeO.name: PageEventType
Enums.html#/s:4page13PageEventTypeO.abstract: PageEventType holds the different types of page events.
